acerca_de_mi__text: I'm a Fullstack web developer, passionate about Frontend ‚ù§Ô∏è. I love technology, programming, and learning new things. I like to work in a team and learn from my colleagues. I am currently studying the second track of the Certified Tech Developer career, conceived and designed by Digital House, Mercado Libre and Globant, in which I am specializing in Frontend development. I recently graduated from Professional Developer, where, with a group of colleagues, we developed a web application as the final project of the first track, in which I worked as a Frontend Developer.
proyecto1__description: Collaborative calendar web application, where events can be viewed, edited, created or deleted.
proyecto2__description: Personal diary web app made with ReactJS, Sign In/Up with Firebase, Google Sign In. Notes can be created, edited, deleted and updated.
proyecto3__description: Functional food ordering web application, made with VueJS + Vuetify, with a shopping cart, registration and login.
contactme__text: If you are interested in working with me, or just want to say hello, do not hesitate to contact me.
contactme__form__mensajeEnviadoTexto: Thank you for contacting me, I will answer you as soon as possible.
contactme__form__mensajeErrorTexto: An error occurred while sending the message, please try again later.
footer__subtitulo: Or you can also contact me through:
